page.title: 03Industry,a survey.
page.content:
{Industry,a survey. { }In the area the Hopton Industrial Estate can be found,the estate is relatively modern and is built of prefabricated warehouses and workshops.Our survey gives three points of information on each company the name of the company,the number of employees working at the company and the product of the company.
{1.Slough Metal Castings. 22 employees. Produces Metal Castings.
{2.Modern Pumps. 1.5 employees.* Produces car pumps. { {3.Surecast Developments. 21 employees. Produces machine castings.
